description: An identifier for an entity (possibly other things, e.g. securities in the future). Examples are tax IDs, non-profit IDs, SEC CIK numbers, Federal Reserve RSSD id. The main requirements for an identifier is that they should be well-defined, and issued by a government or have statutory standing

identifier_system_code.description: An identifier representing the identifier scheme. Some examples of this are us_fein (US Federal tax number), us_sec_cik (US Securities and Exchange Commission CIK), uk_ew_cc (Charity Commission of England & Wales), lei (Global Legal Entity Identifier System)

sample_date.description: Date on which we know this to be true (usually date this information was retrieved from the source)
